name: Kingston A400 480GB SSD
description: 2.5'' SATA III SSD for performance upgrade.
fullDescription: The Kingston A400 SSD is a high-performance storage solution, ideal for breathing new life into old notebooks and desktops. With a SATA III interface and 2.5-inch form factor, it is compatible with most computers. Its access time is virtually instant, meaning you can open files and programs in seconds. In addition, it is more resistant to shocks and drops compared to a traditional HDD, ensuring greater security for your data.

name: Redragon Kumara RGB Mechanical Keyboard
description: Compact mechanical keyboard with RGB lighting.
fullDescription: The Redragon Kumara RGB Mechanical Keyboard is the perfect choice for those seeking performance and style. With Outemu Blue mechanical switches, it provides a tactile and audible response, ideal for gamers and typists. Its RGB lighting is customizable, allowing for a myriad of color combinations and effects. In addition, its compact design saves desk space and facilitates transport.

name: Logitech G203 Lightsync Mouse
description: High-precision RGB gaming mouse.
fullDescription: The Logitech G203 Lightsync Mouse is a gaming mouse that combines performance and style. With a high-precision sensor, it offers reliable tracking on any surface. Its RGB lighting is customizable and can be synchronized with other Logitech G devices. In addition, it has programmable buttons that can be configured to execute macros and complex commands with ease.

name: Dell Inspiron 15 Notebook
description: Notebook with Intel i5, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD.
fullDescription: The Dell Inspiron 15 Notebook is the ideal choice for those seeking a powerful and reliable device. With an 11th generation Intel i5 processor, 8GB of RAM, and a 256GB SSD, it offers fast performance for all your tasks. Its elegant and modern design, coupled with a 15.6'' Full HD display, provides an incredible visual experience. In addition, it has a long-lasting battery, ensuring mobility and practicality for your daily life.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Smartphone
description: High-end smartphone with triple camera.
fullDescription: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Smartphone is the perfect device for those seeking cutting-edge technology and exceptional performance. With an ultra-fast processor, 12GB of RAM, and 256GB of internal storage, it can handle any task with ease. Its triple camera setup of 108MP + 12MP + 10MP ensures professional-quality photos and videos, even in low-light conditions. In addition, it features a 6.1'' Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a 120Hz refresh rate, providing an impressive visual experience.

name: JBL Tune 510BT Bluetooth Headphones
description: Wireless headphones with long battery life.
fullDescription: The JBL Tune 510BT Bluetooth Headphones offer wireless freedom and JBL sound quality. With 32mm drivers, they provide deep bass and balanced sound. Their long-lasting battery guarantees up to 40 hours of playback, and the quick charge feature allows 2 hours of use with just 5 minutes of charging. In addition, they have a lightweight and comfortable design, ideal for listening to music all day long.
specifications: Battery: Up to 40 hours of playback

name: NZXT H510 Gaming Case
description: Mid tower case with tempered glass side panel.
fullDescription: The NZXT H510 Gaming Case combines style and functionality. With an elegant and minimalist design, it is perfect for those who want to build a PC with a clean and sophisticated look. Its tempered glass side panel allows a clear view of the internal components, while the intelligent cable management keeps everything organized. In addition, it has excellent airflow and support for liquid cooling, ensuring optimal performance for your games.

name: Logitech C920 HD Pro Webcam
description: 1080p Full HD webcam with stereo microphone.
fullDescription: The Logitech C920 HD Pro Webcam is ideal for those seeking quality image and sound in video calls. With Full HD 1080p resolution, it provides sharp and detailed images. Its stereo microphone with noise cancellation ensures clear audio without interference. In addition, it is compatible with major video conferencing platforms and has simple and quick installation.

name: Motorola Moto G84 Cell Phone
description: Cell phone with 256GB, dual camera, and OLED display.
fullDescription: The Motorola Moto G84 Cell Phone is the perfect combination of elegant design and powerful performance. With 256GB of internal storage, you will have plenty of space for all your apps, photos, and videos. Its dual camera of 50MP + 12MP allows you to capture amazing images with ease, while the 6.55'' OLED display offers vibrant colors and deep blacks. In addition, it has a long-lasting battery and fast charging, so you can stay connected all the time.

name: Corsair Vengeance 16GB DDR4 RAM
description: DDR4 3200MHz memory module for desktop.
fullDescription: The Corsair Vengeance 16GB DDR4 RAM is the perfect choice for those seeking performance and reliability. With DDR4 technology and 3200MHz speed, it provides a significant increase in the performance of your computer, especially in tasks that require high processing power, such as gaming and video editing. Its aluminum heat spreader design ensures better heat dissipation, increasing the durability of the module.

name: TP-Link Archer C6 Router
description: AC1200 Dual Band Gigabit Router with 4 antennas.
fullDescription: The TP-Link Archer C6 Router is the ideal solution for those seeking a fast and stable internet connection. With Dual Band technology, it offers speeds of up to 1200Mbps, with 300Mbps on the 2.4GHz band and 867Mbps on the 5GHz band. It has 4 external antennas that ensure wide and stable Wi-Fi coverage, in addition to 4 Gigabit LAN ports for high-speed wired connections. It is perfect for streaming 4K videos, online gaming, and downloading large files.

name: HP DeskJet Ink Advantage 2774 Printer
description: Color multifunction printer with Wi-Fi.
fullDescription: The HP DeskJet Ink Advantage 2774 is a multifunction printer that offers quality and practicality. With HP's thermal inkjet technology and a resolution of up to 4800 x 1200 dpi, it provides professional-quality prints. It has Wi-Fi connectivity, allowing you to print from anywhere in the house or office, in addition to supporting mobile printing. It is compact and ideal for those seeking an efficient and easy-to-use printer.
specifications: Print resolution: Up to 4800 x 1200 dpi

name: Apple iPhone 13
description: iPhone 13 128GB, 6.1'' Super Retina XDR display.
fullDescription: The Apple iPhone 13 is a smartphone that combines sophisticated design and cutting-edge technology. With an aluminum and glass body, it is resistant and elegant. Its 6.1'' Super Retina XDR display offers an immersive visual experience, with vibrant colors and impressive contrast. The performance is guaranteed by the A15 Bionic chip, which provides speed and energy efficiency. In addition, the iPhone 13 features a dual 12MP camera system, allowing for professional-quality photos and videos.

name: ASUS Prime B450M-GAMING/BR Motherboard
description: AM4 mATX DDR4 HDMI USB 3.1 motherboard.
fullDescription: The ASUS Prime B450M-GAMING/BR Motherboard is a high-performance motherboard, ideal for those who want to build a PC for gaming or tasks that demand a lot from the processor. With B450 chipset, it is compatible with AMD Ryzen processors of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd generation. It has 4 slots for DDR4 RAM, supporting up to 64GB, and several connectivity options, including USB 3.1, HDMI, and Gigabit Ethernet. Its robust design and advanced cooling features ensure stability and performance even under heavy loads.

name: JBL Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker, waterproof.
fullDescription: The JBL Flip 6 is perfect for those seeking sound quality and portability. With IP67 certification, it is waterproof and dustproof, and can be used anywhere without worrying about the elements. Its battery offers up to 12 hours of continuous playback, and charging is quick and practical. In addition, it features JBL PartyBoost technology, which allows you to connect two compatible speakers for even more powerful sound.
specifications: Battery: Up to 12 hours of playback

name: Kingston 64GB USB 3.2 Pen Drive
description: Compact high-speed pen drive.
fullDescription: The Kingston 64GB USB 3.2 Pen Drive is the ideal solution for those who need extra storage quickly and practically. With USB 3.2 interface, it offers reading and writing speeds far superior to USB 2.0 pen drives, allowing you to transfer large files in seconds. Its compact and lightweight design makes it easy to transport, and the sliding cap protects the USB connector when not in use.

name: ThunderX3 EC3 Gaming Chair
description: Ergonomic chair with lumbar support and height adjustment.
fullDescription: The ThunderX3 EC3 Gaming Chair was developed to provide maximum comfort during long hours of use. With an ergonomic design, it offers proper support for the spine and neck, helping to prevent pain and discomfort. Its high-density foam padding ensures comfort and durability, while the synthetic leather upholstery is easy to clean and keeps the chair looking new for longer. In addition, it has adjustable arms and casters that do not damage the floor.
specifications: Adjustments: Seat height, armrest, and backrest tilt
Casters: Yes, do not damage the floor

name: Corsair CV550 550W Power Supply
description: 80 Plus Bronze certified power supply for PC.
fullDescription: The Corsair CV550 550W Power Supply is a reliable and efficient power supply, ideal for those who want to build a PC with quality components. With 80 Plus Bronze certification, it guarantees an efficiency of at least 85% under typical loads, which means less energy waste and less heat generated. It has a 120mm fan with thermal control, providing quiet and efficient operation. In addition, it has protection against overload, overvoltage, and short-circuit, ensuring the safety of your components.
specifications: Connectors: ATX, EPS, PCIe, SATA, and Molex

name: Cooler Master Hyper 212
description: Processor cooler with 4 heatpipes.
fullDescription: The Cooler Master Hyper 212 is one of the most renowned processor coolers on the market, known for its efficiency and low noise level. With 4 copper heatpipes, it provides excellent heat conduction, keeping the processor at ideal temperatures even under heavy loads. Its design with a 120mm fan allows for optimized airflow and static pressure, ensuring effective cooling. In addition, it is compatible with most Intel and AMD processor sockets.

name: SMS Revolution Speedy 300VA Stabilizer
description: Bivolt stabilizer for equipment protection.
fullDescription: The SMS Revolution Speedy 300VA Stabilizer is ideal for protecting your electronic equipment against voltage variations. With microprocessor technology, it offers superior protection against overvoltages, undervoltages, and voltage spikes. It has 4 output sockets, 2 of which have surge protection, and 1 input for network cable. Its compact and modern design allows it to be placed in any environment without taking up much space.
specifications: Protection: Against overvoltages, undervoltages, and voltage spikes

name: Epson EcoTank L3250 Printer
description: Wi-Fi multifunction printer with ink tank.
fullDescription: The Epson EcoTank L3250 is a multifunction printer that uses tank technology, providing economical and high-quality printing. With Wi-Fi connectivity, it allows you to print, copy, and scan documents quickly and practically, directly from your smartphone or tablet. Its compact and modern design fits into any environment, and the installation of the ink system is simple and clean, without the need for cartridges.

name: Razer DeathAdder V2 Mouse
description: Ergonomic gaming mouse with 20,000 DPI sensor.
fullDescription: The Razer DeathAdder V2 is a high-performance gaming mouse featuring an ergonomic design and a Focus+ 20,000 DPI optical sensor for precise tracking. With Razer Speedflex cable and optical switches, it ensures fast response and durability for competitive gaming.

name: AOC 24G2 24'' Gaming Monitor
description: 144Hz Full HD IPS gaming monitor.
fullDescription: The AOC 24G2 is a 24-inch gaming monitor with IPS panel, 144Hz refresh rate, and 1ms response time. It offers vibrant colors, wide viewing angles, and smooth gameplay for competitive gamers.

name: Seagate Barracuda 2TB HDD
description: 3.5'' SATA III hard drive for desktop.
fullDescription: The Seagate Barracuda 2TB HDD is a reliable storage solution for desktops, offering high capacity and fast data transfer rates. Ideal for storing large files, games, and backups.

name: TP-Link TL-WN822N USB Wi-Fi Adapter
description: 300Mbps high-gain wireless USB adapter.
fullDescription: The TP-Link TL-WN822N is a high-gain USB Wi-Fi adapter that provides stable and fast wireless connections for desktops and laptops. Its dual external antennas ensure better coverage and signal strength.

name: Samsung 980 1TB NVMe SSD
description: PCIe Gen3 x4 M.2 NVMe SSD for high-speed storage.
fullDescription: The Samsung 980 1TB NVMe SSD delivers blazing-fast read and write speeds for gaming, content creation, and everyday computing. Its M.2 form factor makes it ideal for modern desktops and laptops.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 7
description: 2-in-1 laptop with Intel i5, 8GB RAM, 128GB SSD.
fullDescription: The Microsoft Surface Pro 7 is a versatile 2-in-1 device that combines the power of a laptop with the portability of a tablet. Featuring a 12.3-inch touchscreen, Intel i5 processor, and long battery life.

name: Canon EOS Rebel T7 Camera
description: DSLR camera with 18-55mm lens.
fullDescription: The Canon EOS Rebel T7 is a user-friendly DSLR camera perfect for beginners and enthusiasts. It features a 24.1MP sensor, built-in Wi-Fi, and comes with an 18-55mm lens for versatile shooting.

name: Kingston HyperX Cloud II Headset
description: Gaming headset with 7.1 virtual surround sound.
fullDescription: The Kingston HyperX Cloud II is a premium gaming headset featuring 53mm drivers, memory foam ear cushions, and a detachable microphone. Enjoy immersive 7.1 virtual surround sound for gaming and multimedia.

name: Logitech K380 keyboard
description: Compact multi-device Bluetooth keyboard.
fullDescription: The Logitech K380 is a compact and lightweight Bluetooth keyboard that allows you to connect and switch between up to three devices. Compatible with Windows, Mac, Android, and iOS.

name: LG 27UL500 27'' 4K Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K UHD IPS monitor with HDR10.
fullDescription: The LG 27UL500 is a 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with IPS panel and HDR10 support. Ideal for productivity, content creation, and entertainment with stunning color accuracy.
